label: specifiedProductBatchCertificate
comment: A certificate specified for this product batch.
A product batch certificate specified for this facility production unit.
A product batch certificate specified for this production facility.

rangeIncludes.comment: A piece of written, printed or electronic matter that provides information or evidence that a product batch has met required criteria.

domainIncludes.comment: A group of products considered or dealt with together.
A man made physical structure, such as a building, in which something is produced.
A defined set of production processes under the single management of a facility.
